title: First Ride Review: Revel Wheels adds RW23 Gravel wheelset
content:
Revel Bikes has enjoyed astronomical popularity since its launch just a few short years ago. It stands to reason that any product it launches, now that it has become a hot commodity in the mountain bike world, should come under intense scrutiny to ensure it lives up to that quickly-growing reputation.
